testimonials.name: Mike R.
testimonials.text: Spark Electric was fantastic! They upgraded our panel same day and the price was exactly as quoted. Very professional team.

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.text: Called them for an emergency at 10pm and they were here within 30 minutes. Fixed the issue quickly. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Tom K.
testimonials.text: Great experience with outdoor lighting installation. The team was knowledgeable and cleaned up everything after.

faq.question: What are signs of electrical problems?
faq.answer: Warning signs include flickering lights, frequent breaker trips, burning smells, sparking outlets, and warm switch plates. If you notice any of these, call us immediately.

faq.question: How often should I have an electrical inspection?
faq.answer: We recommend an inspection every 3-5 years for homes, or whenever you purchase a new home. Older homes may need more frequent inspections.

faq.question: Do you handle emergency electrical work?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7 emergency electrical services for power outages, sparking outlets, and other urgent electrical issues.
